CHEESE SUB, MOZZARELLA SHREDDED VEGAN BULK BAG REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Wash and core whole tomatoes. 

2. Using a slicer, slice tomatoes 1/4". 

3. Place in a storage container and hold at 40°F or below until ready 
for use.

1. Cut a torpedo roll in half, lengthwise.

2. Spread 1 oz vegan Caesar Dressing on the bottom half of the bread.

3. Lay each half of a prepared Boca patty evenly on top of the dressing.

4. Spread 1 oz shredded vegan mozzarella evenly over veggie patty.

5. Place sandwich on screen and toast for 1.5 minutes at 500°F. 

6. Squeeze 1 oz vegan Caesar dressing on the toasted top half of the 
Vienna roll. 

7. Top with 2.5 oz shredded romaine and 3 tomato slices. 

8. Wrap sandwich in paper.
